verses.kjv: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
verses.ct: May the LORD answer you when trouble comes; may the name of Jacob's God protect you.

verses.kjv: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;
verses.ct: May he send you assistance from his holy place and support you from Zion.

verses.kjv: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.
verses.ct: May he keep in mind all your offerings and look with favor on your burnt sacrifice. Selah.

verses.kjv: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
verses.ct: May he give you what your heart desires and bring all your plans to success.

verses.kjv: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.
verses.ct: We will celebrate your salvation, and we will raise our banners in the name of our God. May the LORD grant every one of your requests.

verses.kjv: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
verses.ct: Now I know that the LORD rescues his anointed one; he will respond to him from his holy heaven with the mighty saving power of his right hand.

verses.kjv: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
verses.ct: Some put their confidence in chariots, and others in horses, but we place our trust in the name of the LORD our God.

verses.kjv: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
verses.ct: They collapse and fall, but we rise up and stand firm.

verses.kjv: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.
verses.ct: Save us, LORD! May the king answer us on the day we call out.
